title: Authentication Challenge
description: Regroups the data of the authentication challenge.

derivedVoterIdentifier.description: A random 32 characters hexadecimal string identifying the voter. Corresponds to credentialID_id in the specification.

derivedAuthenticationChallenge.description: A base64 string of size 44 representing the derived authentication challenge. Corresponds to hhAuth_id in the specification.

authenticationNonce.description: The authentication nonce, base64 encoded. Corresponds to nonce in the specification.
